snippet.title: Begone Beast Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Begone Beast now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2192380/Begone_Beast/

BEGONE BEAST is a spooky cooperative top-down action game for 1-4 players. HACK & SLASH & SCREAM through hordes of demons, endlessly changing levels, and ancient terrifying BEASTS. Harness the unfathomable power of SNACKS, FLASHLIGHTS, and FRIENDSHIP in this scary (but also cute) race for survival!
